mutants.code:
def generate_subsets(s):
    n = len(s)
    subsets = set()
    for i in range(2, 2 ** n):
        subset = [s[j] for j in range(n) if i & 1 << j]
        subsets.add(''.join(sorted(subset)))
    return subsets

def generate_subsets(s):
